items.content_html: Have been using Vivaldi a bit and discovered a really nice feature: if you use the bookmarks bar you can click on a folder there and add the active tab as a bookmark. Nice shortcut!

items.content_html: Really trying hard to remove myself from the echo chamber I keep finding myself in online. micro.blog needs another Jean or needs an automated Discover feed. The one as it exists is not a feature to sell the platform when it is hardly updated.

items.content_html: HEY’s handling of contacts really is bad. If you use any service (like craigslist) that generates random addresses all of that shit starts to clog up your contact list. And since there is no way to bulk delete contacts…. yeah its a freaking mess.
items.content_text: HEY's handling of contacts really is bad. If you use any service (like craigslist) that generates random addresses all of that shit starts to clog up your contact list. And since there is no way to bulk delete contacts....   yeah its a freaking mess.

items.content_html: Ghost added the ability in the newest release (5.129.0) to upload HEIC files and it auto-converts them to JPG. Seems like a pretty major deal for Mac/iOS users but it’s not listed as one of the major changes in their release notes üßê

items.content_html: The Craft team says “Search just got smarter. We’ve laid the groundwork for a stronger, faster, and better search experience.” What exactly does that mean? Smarter how? Its shocking to me that PKM-type tools (or email providers) can provide poor search capability.

items.content_html: 11 years ago today my wife and I, on our trip to Watkins Glen NY, stopped by Watkins Glen State Park. Really, really beautiful park. Get there early as the tiny parking lot fills up fast!
items.content_text: 11 years ago today my wife and I, on our trip to Watkins Glen NY, stopped by Watkins Glen State Park. Really, really beautiful park. Get there early as the tiny parking lot fills up fast!

items.content_html: For those wondering, yes it’s me. Trying to clean house a bit. I’ve been seeing a lot of rats around as of late so figured maybe getting into a new house would help. Same neighborhood of course but sometimes a change of scenery is just what the doc ordered.
